main event: The report outlines observations of various unidentified aerial objects, including satellites and low-flying glowing objects in Hancock, NY.
interesting points: The object was observed moving across the sky faster than the North Star's apparent motion., The sightings occurred on at least seven different occasions., One account mentions several oval-shaped discs hovering for about 10 seconds., The objects showed no flashing lights or normal aircraft markings., It was reported that the object made no sound and disappeared at a high rate of speed.
witness description: male, age 39, reported sightings multiple times
